TopicTitle: Set the Controls for the Heart of the Sun

Articles.Content:
We are on board !

Hello KSP forums.

Kerbal Space Program has been running here since version 0.22 and everyone at home loves it. Now for the part of us currently writing this message, I am a 37 trained artist, who throughout his modest career has been tinkering (with variable success) with various tools, including Small Stone phaser pedals, analog vocoders and a chainsaw. I live in France, and enjoy trying to put 200-tons houses of cards in orbit while listening to space rock. Or catchy space disco tunes.

Cheers !

Welcome to the forums! I am pretty curious to see some of your 200 ton orbital card-houses .

And yes, i like Pink Floyd too.
Welcome to the Community! Love your choice in music, too!
